BR_text.BRsummary: Uncaught (in promise) Error: Unrecognized transform type: "filter"

comments_0.comment_text:
Also experiencing this using the latest version on the CDN, which is 1.4.2
 The workaround for now is to pin to 1.4.1:
 <denchmark-code> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@tensorflow/tfjs-vis@1.4.1"></script>
 </denchmark-code>

comments_2.comment_text:
Should be fixed in <denchmark-link:https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@tensorflow/tfjs-vis@1.4.3>https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@tensorflow/tfjs-vis@1.4.3</denchmark-link>
  give that a try and let us know if that works.

comments_3.comment_text: Yes, version 1.4.3 works. Thanks for the update.
